value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|That's right! All of your fathers are
here, working for the Order of
Heroes to help Askr!$k$pObviously they're all powerful assets
on the battlefield, but they help out
with festivals and stuff like that too.$k$p$WmMPID_マトイ,ch05_61_Matoi_F_Normal,Face|Yes, my father has told me as much.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|So upright! So dignified! You're the
spitting image of Subaki, Caeldori.$k$p$WmMPID_マトイ,ch05_61_Matoi_F_Normal,Face|Ah... Thank you, but the truth is I am
nowhere near his equal. Not yet.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Aw, that's not true. Hey, Kiragi! Show
me how you draw that bow! I bet
you'll look just like Takumi!$k$p$WmMPID_キサラギ,ch05_62_Kisaragi_M_Normal,Face|You think so, Princess Sharena?
Well... Good! I'm glad!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, and Dwyer, that coffee you made
me this morning was phenomenal!
Did Jakob teach you how to brew?$k$p$WmMPID_ディーア,ch05_60_Deere_M_Normal,Face|He trained me to be a butler. But
when it comes to coffee...it is he
who aspires to match my skill.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Oh, wow! I'll keep that in mind.
Say, Ophelia, could you tell me
about that tome you've got?$k$pIf your father were here, I'm sure he
would say something like "I sense
a terrrrible power lurking within!"$k$p$WmMPID_魔器オフェリア,ch05_44_Ophelia_F_Weapon01,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Um, Ophelia? I didn't offend you,
did I? Sorry, I know I get carried
away sometimes.$k$p$WmMPID_魔器オフェリア,ch05_44_Ophelia_F_Weapon01,Face|At last, these esoteric visions have
begun to make sense to me. Yes,
I understand them all too well now.$k$pThis hand, imbued with incredible
power. This tome, placed into that
hand as if by the will of destiny.$k$pThis land of Askr, plagued by endless
war! Yes, I see now why I descended
upon this place!$k$p$WmMPID_キサラギ,ch05_62_Kisaragi_M_Normal,Face|Uh... What's going on with Ophelia?
Do you know, Caeldori?$k$p$WmMPID_マトイ,ch05_61_Matoi_F_Normal,Face|I haven't the faintest idea. Nothing
she's saying makes any sense to me.$k$p$WmMPID_ディーア,ch05_60_Deere_M_Normal,Face|Maybe she hit her head on the
summoning gate.$k$p$WmMPID_魔器オフェリア,ch05_44_Ophelia_F_Weapon01,Face|Your words have made everything
clear to me, Princess Sharena.$k$pThis Order of Heroes, with its flattery
and its festivals, is ill-prepared to
protect this doomed world!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Umm, what? What do you mean
by that?$k$p$WmMPID_魔器オフェリア,ch05_44_Ophelia_F_Weapon01,Face|I mean precisely what I say! Open
your ears as you do your gates!$k$pBeach vacations? Holiday festivals?
Destruction is on your doorstep!
How do you justify such frivolity?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hey, we get up to a bit of fun here,
but you've got the wrong idea.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Every Hero is giving the mission to
save Askr their all!$k$p$WmMPID_魔器オフェリア,ch05_44_Ophelia_F_Weapon01,Face|Your words are empty air.$k$pThe jaws of annihilation are clenched
around you. They are without mercy.
They wait for no one!$k$p$WmMPID_キサラギ,ch05_62_Kisaragi_M_Normal,Face|Right... Isn't that why we're here?
To help with that?$k$p$WmMPID_魔器オフェリア,ch05_44_Ophelia_F_Weapon01,Face|Indeed, we have been called to this
place for that very reason.$k$pBut this Order of Heroes is merely a
crumbling farce. They lack the power
to fulfill their ambitions!$k$p$WmMPID_マトイ,ch05_61_Matoi_F_Normal,Face|Are you OK, Ophelia?$k$p$WmMPID_魔器オフェリア,ch05_44_Ophelia_F_Weapon01,Face|No longer will I answer to the name
Ophelia Dusk. You will now address
me as Ophelia the Resurgent Star!$k$pI hereby declare that the Order of
Heroes shall meet its end! I alone
will usher Askr to its salvation!$k$p
